method.code: SortTools.setSortedChildren(null, this, engine, ComboColumnComponent.class, new ComboColumnComponent[] { comboColumn });
throw new FacesException("Can not set value of 'SelectItemsIterator', use 'items' attribute to set the collection.");

tag.name: selectionListener
tag.description: Register a SelectionListener instance on the UIComponent associated with the closest parent UIComponent custom action.

attribute.name: type
attribute.description: Fully qualified Java class name of a SelectionListener to be created and registered.
